name: SkyGreen
description: SkyGreen app is an offline/online field survey and data collection application. Field tasks are controlled from the central server, all field related task could be pushed from the server on to the field, there is no need to re-install the app, SkyGreen is currently used for collection data from Crop Cutting Experiments(CCE), Crop Monitoring (CCM), Crop Loss Assessment, Crop Signatures (GPS point collection), Asset inspection etc. Any new task could be configured on the server and the collected data is sync back to server whenever there is an appropriate connectivity. Application is capable of collecting GPS, photos and videos. Offline maps could be cached and then bundled along with the app for the areas where there is no internet connectivity.
